body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Car Dealership. My name is Walter Perez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Helen. Could you please provide me with your phone number so that we can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, three two one, four zero nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Helen. Can you also tell me your current location for shipping purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, I am currently residing in town of Oakville, postal code L6H 6J8.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your information, Helen. Is there any specific concern or issue you would like to address today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling sad that my car shipment has been delayed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Helen. We will look into this matter promptly. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Helen. We will follow up with you shortly on the status of your shipment. Have a great day.
